stripped_text: You can install bioroid ice onto this upgrade at no install cost. Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez 1 hosted piece of ice, paying 7 credits less. If you do, the Runner encounters that ice. When this run ends, trash that ice.
text: You can install bioroid ice onto this upgrade at no install cost. Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez 1 hosted piece of ice, paying 7[credit] less. If you do, the Runner encounters that ice. When this run ends, trash that ice.
title: Awakening Center
